ðŸ“– Summary: sqlit is a user-friendly Terminal User Interface (TUI) application written in Python for interacting with various SQL databases directly from your command line. It aims to provide a fast, intuitive, and efficient way to connect, query, and inspect database data without the need for heavy graphical applications.
